title: Factors Associated with COVID-19 Vaccine Hesitancy in Korea
author: Kweon; Sun-Seog; Yun; Il; Choi; Changkyun; Ryu; So-Yeon; Cho; Jun Hwi; Shin; Min-Ho
cleaned_text: the Korean Association of Medical Journal Editors (KAMJE), provides access to articles published in Korean medical, dental, nursing, nutrition and veterinary journals. KoreaMed records include links to full-text content in Synapse and publisher web sites.
